author: tfischer
msg: Inserted a note that BIT is not longer supported for Oracle

author: tfischer
msg: Added a simple testcase for reading and writing LOBS
Appended a check to a testcase that newly generated objects are filled with autogenerated ids

author: tfischer
msg: Fixed some errors in the lob_test table
- do not use reserved words as column names

author: tfischer
msg: shifted a helper method to the end of the class

author: tfischer
msg: In Torque 3.1.1, BIT columns were treated as Strings with the value 0 and 1. This caused problems in various DBs (e.g. HSQLDB).
Reverted to the old behaviour: The adapter decides for selects which value is used, the db driver (via PreparedStatement.setValue()) decides for inserts/updates.
